form.page_subtitle: PNC Diagnostic Mother: PNC Mother Anaemia> Moderate Anaemia

field.name: If possible, give client iron and folate supplements: 1 iron tablet to be taken twice daily + 1 folic acid tablet to be taken once daily
Counsel client to eat foods rich in iron and folate + vitamin C
Record care given in client’s maternal health or “Red” book.
Follow up with client in 2 weeks, and refer her to the nearest health facility to check Hb
